---
title: "Troubleshooting"
---

## Common Errors

### Object not found

```
Error: object 'x' not found
```

Check spelling and make sure the object exists in your environment.

### Could not find function

```
Error: could not find function "read_csv"
```

Load the required package first: `library(readr)`

### Unexpected symbol

```
Error: unexpected symbol in "..."
```

Check for missing commas, brackets, or quotes.

### NA values

```r
# Remove NA values
data |> drop_na()

# Ignore NA in calculations
mean(x, na.rm = TRUE)
```

## Getting Help

```r
?function_name
help(package = "tidyverse")
```
